short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a unique GUID/UUID and inserts it into a text field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will add an item to your right click / context menu when right clicking on a text input field of a web page. Choosing "Generate GUID / UUID" will then generate a unique id and  *replace* the contents of the field with the new id.
